title: Taitara
titleTooltip: He ingoa poto, whakaahuatanga mo te kōrero
uploadArtefactButtonTooltip: Ngā pāpāho whaipānga ki te kōrero he pikitia, he tuhinga, he ataata, he kōnae whakarongo rānei ka tāea
locationTooltip: He kōrero poto mō te tauwāhi te wāhi rānei e hono ana ki te kōrero
mentionTooltip: Te hunga, te hāpori hoki e kōrerotia ana e hono rānei ki te purākau
descriptionTooltip: He whakāturanga hōhonu mo te kōrero
contributorTooltip: He tangata, tāngata rānei kua tākoha atu ki te tuhinga o te purākau ki te pūranga
collectionTooltip: Ko te kohinga he rōpu kōrero
relatedRecordsTooltip: He hononga i waenganui o ngā kōrero e rua hei arahi i ngā kaipāhui mai i tētahi kōrero ki tetahi kōrero
collectionPlaceholder: tāpirihia te kōrero ki te kohinga
contributorNotesTooltip: He horopaki tāpiri mō te kōrero pakiwaitara rānei
formatTooltip: Te āhua a-tinana, a-tihi rānei o te pakiwaitara, o ngā taonga rawe rānei
identifierTooltip: He ahurei, tino kore kōrero mo te kōrero
sourceTooltip: Ko Te Ahunga, he hononga ki te rauemi ki te wānanga rānei, i te orokohanga mai o te pūrākau
languageTooltip: Te reo kua horaina mai mo ngā kōrero, mo ngā rawa pāpāho
transcriptionTooltip: He tauwāhi pātuhi. Kia tuku whakamāoritanga / whakapākehātanga mo te rongorongo, te ataata, te pātuhi ki ngā pikitia, mauhanga rānei
access: E āhei ana koe me tō kotahi te uru atu ki tēnei rua
